Body Equilibrium.name: Body Equilibrium
Body Equilibrium.fullText:
Wild Talent CantripBody Equilibrium

You sense how to shift your weight from step to step, staying atop a tricky surface.

At-Will      Psionic
Move Action      Personal

Effect: You move your speed. During the move, you gain a +5 power bonus to Acrobatics checks to balance and do not sink when moving over soft or brittle terrain, such as dust, silt, mud, snow, or thin ice.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 81.
Body Equilibrium.flavor: You sense how to shift your weight from step to step, staying atop a tricky surface.
Body Equilibrium.range:
Personal

Effect: You move your speed. During the move, you gain a +5 power bonus to Acrobatics checks to balance and do not sink when moving over soft or brittle terrain, such as dust, silt, mud, snow, or thin ice.
Body Equilibrium.effect: You move your speed. During the move, you gain a +5 power bonus to Acrobatics checks to balance and do not sink when moving over soft or brittle terrain, such as dust, silt, mud, snow, or thin ice.

Far Hearing.name: Far Hearing
Far Hearing.fullText:
Wild Talent CantripFar Hearing

For a moment, you can hear even distant whispers.

At-Will      Psionic
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Choose one square you can see that is within 10 squares of you. Until the end of your next turn, you can hear as if you occupied that square.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 81.
Far Hearing.flavor: For a moment, you can hear even distant whispers.
Far Hearing.range:
Personal

Effect: Choose one square you can see that is within 10 squares of you. Until the end of your next turn, you can hear as if you occupied that square.
Far Hearing.effect: Choose one square you can see that is within 10 squares of you. Until the end of your next turn, you can hear as if you occupied that square.

Know Direction.name: Know Direction
Know Direction.fullText:
Wild Talent CantripKnow Direction

With a moment’s concentration, you sense which way is true north.

At-Will      Psionic
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You determine which way is north. For 1 hour, you gain a +2 power bonus to checks to navigate natural terrain using either Perception or Nature.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 81.
Know Direction.flavor: With a moment’s concentration, you sense which way is true north.
Know Direction.range:
Personal

Effect: You determine which way is north. For 1 hour, you gain a +2 power bonus to checks to navigate natural terrain using either Perception or Nature.
Know Direction.effect: You determine which way is north. For 1 hour, you gain a +2 power bonus to checks to navigate natural terrain using either Perception or Nature.

Mental Tools.name: Mental Tools
Mental Tools.fullText:
Wild Talent CantripMental Tools

From thought, you create matter, equipping yourself with the simple tools you need.

At-Will      Psionic
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You create a simple tool you can hold in one hand. The object appears in your hand or at your feet. You cannot use the object to attack or hinder another creature. The object lasts until the end of the encounter or until you use this power again.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 81.
Mental Tools.flavor: From thought, you create matter, equipping yourself with the simple tools you need.
Mental Tools.range:
Personal

Effect: You create a simple tool you can hold in one hand. The object appears in your hand or at your feet. You cannot use the object to attack or hinder another creature. The object lasts until the end of the encounter or until you use this power again.
Mental Tools.effect: You create a simple tool you can hold in one hand. The object appears in your hand or at your feet. You cannot use the object to attack or hinder another creature. The object lasts until the end of the encounter or until you use this power again.

Object Projection.name: Object Projection
Object Projection.fullText:
Wild Talent CantripObject Projection

Your force of will teleports an object a short distance away.

At-Will      Psionic, Teleportation
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You teleport an object you are holding in one hand to an unoccupied square within 10 squares of you or to a willing creature within 10 squares of you.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 81.
Object Projection.flavor: Your force of will teleports an object a short distance away.
Object Projection.range:
Personal

Effect: You teleport an object you are holding in one hand to an unoccupied square within 10 squares of you or to a willing creature within 10 squares of you.
Object Projection.effect: You teleport an object you are holding in one hand to an unoccupied square within 10 squares of you or to a willing creature within 10 squares of you.

Psionic Image.name: Psionic Image
Psionic Image.fullText:
Wild Talent CantripPsionic Image

You plant the image of an object in the minds of nearby creatures.

At-Will      Illusion, Psionic
Minor Action      Close burst 5

Target: One or more creatures in the burst

Effect: Each target sees the image of a Small or smaller object in your hand or in a square in the burst. The image lasts until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 81.
Psionic Image.flavor: You plant the image of an object in the minds of nearby creatures.
Psionic Image.range:
Close burst 5

Target: One or more creatures in the burst

Effect: Each target sees the image of a Small or smaller object in your hand or in a square in the burst. The image lasts until the end of your next turn.
Psionic Image.target: One or more creatures in the burst
Psionic Image.effect: Each target sees the image of a Small or smaller object in your hand or in a square in the burst. The image lasts until the end of your next turn.

Psionic Spark.name: Psionic Spark
Psionic Spark.fullText:
Wild Talent CantripPsionic Spark

You focus your anger, frustration, or passion into one small object until the heat of your emotion ignites it.

At-Will      Psionic
Minor Action      Ranged 5

Target: One flammable object that isn’t carried by another creature

Effect: You cause the target to catch fire.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 81.
Psionic Spark.flavor: You focus your anger, frustration, or passion into one small object until the heat of your emotion ignites it.
Psionic Spark.range:
Ranged 5

Target: One flammable object that isn’t carried by another creature

Effect: You cause the target to catch fire.
Psionic Spark.target: One flammable object that isn’t carried by another creature
Psionic Spark.effect: You cause the target to catch fire.

Sensing Eye.name: Sensing Eye
Sensing Eye.fullText:
Wild Talent CantripSensing Eye

An image forms in your mind, revealing what you would see if you were standing some distance away.

At-Will      Psionic
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Choose one square you can see that is within 5 squares of you. Until the end of your next turn, you can determine your line of sight from that square.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 81.
Sensing Eye.flavor: An image forms in your mind, revealing what you would see if you were standing some distance away.
Sensing Eye.range:
Personal

Effect: Choose one square you can see that is within 5 squares of you. Until the end of your next turn, you can determine your line of sight from that square.
Sensing Eye.effect: Choose one square you can see that is within 5 squares of you. Until the end of your next turn, you can determine your line of sight from that square.

Telekinetic Grasp.name: Telekinetic Grasp
Telekinetic Grasp.fullText:
Wild Talent CantripTelekinetic Grasp

With your mental strength, you can manipulate nearby objects.

At-Will      Psionic
Minor Action      Ranged 5

Target: One object that weighs 20 pounds or less and isn’t carried by another creature

Effect: You manipulate the target or move it 5 squares to a square within range.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 81.
Telekinetic Grasp.flavor: With your mental strength, you can manipulate nearby objects.
Telekinetic Grasp.range:
Ranged 5

Target: One object that weighs 20 pounds or less and isn’t carried by another creature

Effect: You manipulate the target or move it 5 squares to a square within range.

Telekinetic Grasp.effect: You manipulate the target or move it 5 squares to a square within range.

Thought Projection.name: Thought Projection
Thought Projection.fullText:
Wild Talent CantripThought Projection

You broadcast a thought or an image to nearby allies.

At-Will      Psionic
Minor Action      Close burst 5

Target: One or more allies in the burst

Effect: You convey either an image or a message of 10 words or fewer to each target.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 81.
Thought Projection.flavor: You broadcast a thought or an image to nearby allies.
Thought Projection.range:
Close burst 5

Target: One or more allies in the burst

Effect: You convey either an image or a message of 10 words or fewer to each target.
